body: You inherit a special boon from your hag parent.
name: Mother's Gift
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Changelings/New Racial Rules/Changeling Feats/Mothers Gift

sections.body: Your dark legacy manifests in one of the following ways. You choose the manifestation when you choose the feat, and once selected it cannot be changed.
sections.name: Benefit

sections.body: You gain a +1 bonus on attack and damage rolls with your claws.
sections.name: Hag Claws
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Changelings/New Racial Rules/Changeling Feats/Mothers Gift/Benefit/Hag Claws

sections.body: Your natural armor bonus increases by +1.
sections.name: Surprisingly Tough
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Changelings/New Racial Rules/Changeling Feats/Mothers Gift/Benefit/Surprisingly Tough

sections.body: You gain spell resistance equal to 6 + your character level.
sections.name: Uncanny Resistance
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Changelings/New Racial Rules/Changeling Feats/Mothers Gift/Benefit/Uncanny Resistance

sections.body: You can gain this feat up to three times. Its effects do not stack. Each time you take the feat, you must select a different manifestation.
sections.name: Special
